title: Trump accuses Biden of misusing autopen: What to know
shortDescription: Presidential use of the autopen is not illegal. And Trump admitted that his staff uses the device to mimic his signature on letters.

title: Nuevo veto migratorio de Trump afecta a varios países
shortDescription: El nuevo decreto presidencial impide el ingreso a Estados Unidos de ciudadanos de 12 países, mientras impone restricciones parciales a otros 7.

title: President Trump threatens Elon Musk's billions in government contracts
shortDescription: The broken alliance between the president and the world's richest man could threaten Musk's lucrative pending – and future – federal subsidies.

title: Musk-Trump timeline: Key events leading to their public feud
shortDescription: The public split between President Donald Trump and former White House adviser Elon Musk grew into an exchange of fiery comments on June 5.

title: Elon Musk turns on Trump: 'Time to drop the really big bomb'
shortDescription: Elon Musk alleged President Donald Trump's name is listed in classified files related to the financier and sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump travel ban: Why is each nation on the list?
shortDescription: Here is a closer look at why the administration says it is instituting full bans on foreign nationals traveling to the U.S. from 12 nations.

title: Trump admin must restore AmeriCorps programs in 24 states, judge rules
shortDescription: The judge's ruling applied only to Democratic-led states who sued in April to challenge what they said was Trump's unlawful dismantling of AmeriCorps.

title: Trump, Musk spar over 'big, beautiful bill'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump responded to Elon Musk's criticism of his "big, beautiful bill" with disappointment as Musk responded on X.

title: Expired milk, missing soap: Violations at Trump's NJ golf club
shortDescription: Multiple health code violations were reported at President Donald Trump's New Jersey golf club in May.

title: Trump says Russia, Ukraine may fight more to exhaust their hatred
shortDescription: Trump told German Chancellor Friedrich Merz that Russia and Ukraine were fighting like children in a park and might not want to be pulled apart yet.

title: Trump says why Egypt wasn't part of a travel ban he tied to attack
shortDescription: "Egypt has been a country that we deal with very closely. They have things under control," Trump said of the nation's exemption from his travel ban.

title: Supreme Court sides with Catholic Charities in tax exemption case
shortDescription: The Supreme Court ruled that Wisconsin violated the First Amendment by denying a tax exemption to a Catholic Charities chapter.

title: Trump and Musk's bromance blows up after war of personal attacks
shortDescription: President Trump said his relationship with Elon Musk might be over after Musk spent the past few days trying to defeat Trump's "big, beautiful bill."

title: A Qatari plane, $1m per-plate dinners, $TRUMP crypto?
shortDescription: The family and friends of this president are living it up with highly questionable and possibly illegal behavior.

title: Trump's actions on LGBTQ+ issues criticized as 'bullying' by advocates
shortDescription: The federal government has recognized June as Pride Month under three Democratic presidents, highlighting the contributions of LGBTQ+ people.

title: Trump overpowers Musk's attacks with blizzard of orders
shortDescription: After remaining quiet about Elon Musk's attacks, President Donald Trump unleashed a flurry of executive actions that steered the discourse.

title: Elon Musk tries to nuke Trump's GOP tax plan | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A new analysis finds nearly 11 million Americans would lose insurance under Trump's tax bill. | Trump bans travel from twelve nations.

title: Supreme Court sides with Catholic Charities in case about taxes and religion
shortDescription: The dispute over whether a Catholic Charities office in Wisconsin must pay unemployment taxes was one of three complex religion cases before the court.

title: Trump travel ban list: See what foreign nations will face restrictions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued a travel ban, restricting entry of foreign nationals from 12 countries and partially banning 7 more. See the list.

title: Trump and China's Xi hold first call amid tariff and trade war
shortDescription: President Trump and China's Xi Jinping accepted invitations to visit each other's countries during a call about their trade dispute and tariffs.

title: Trump bans Harvard from admitting foreign students
shortDescription: A new two-page directive from President Donald Trump bans Harvard from admitting new international students.
